version_description:
Прошу прощения, что выход обновления так затянулся, был в отпуске, потом ловили баги, потом вышла iOS 8, снова ловили баги, но главное что наше долгожданное(надеюсь) обновление уже здесь:

— Поддержка iOS 8
— Новый раздел "Дни Рождения"
Возможность импортировать Дни Рождения друзей из ВК, ОК, Контактов + добавлять вручную, можно настроить 3 напоминания, например за 3 дня, и за 1 день до Д.Р.
— Новая кнопка в плашке над клавиатурой - переход на новую строку (аналог "Enter")
— Новая плашка внизу экрана, 4 кнопки, 1. быстрый выбор листа, 2. показать задачи только на сегодня в хронологическом порядке, 3. Удалить все выполненные задачи 4. Шаринг
— Добавили настройку "Бейджа"(цифры на иконке программы)
— Добавили Английский язык (если язык устройства английский)
— Добавили в режим "Повторять" таймер "Каждый год"
— Добавили 4ый период в список отложения напоминания + можно выбрать время суток (Утро, День, Вечер)
— Длинный тап по задаче = скопировать в буфер обмена
— Обновленный дизайн списков задач в настройках
— Вынесли видео-инструкцию в ютуб, ListBox теперь весит 7 мегабайт
— Резервная копия теперь сохраняет ВСЕ настройки, а не только листы и задачи
— Добавлены звуки напоминания и новый шрифт

— Исправление ошибок

- добавлена возможность отображать точное время для задачи вместо часиков (настройки вида)
- исправлены баги

HOT FIX
---
Sorry the update took so long to be released. There were reasons, but the most important thing is that our long-awaited (I hope) update is now here:

— Updated design and icon
— New button on the lower panel; lists can be sorted by Date Added, Reminder Date, and color
— The lower panel can now be swiped through
— Completely new timer system
— Completely new timer system for postponing reminders
— You can now make several timers such as «Morning,» Evening,» and «Midday»
— New timers: Beginning/middle/end of week, month, year
— 13 new reminder melodies
— The number on the icon can now be not just tasks for today or all tasks, but also only skipped tasks
— The birthday badge has been moved to the lower panel for quick access
— Now tapping the button for a task for today causes tasks from all lists to be displayed
— Birthday reminders have been fixed
— Birthdays can now be edited
— Completely new section: «Contribute to the Project»
— When you are adding a task and get a call the task is no longer deleted
— The «Enter» button now works correctly if you place the cursor anywhere in the task
— New instructional video
— The app has been optimized and bugs have been fixed

Stick with us. There are lots of cool things coming :)

Bug fix
---
Sorry the update took so long to be released. There were reasons, but the most important thing is that our long-awaited (I hope) update is now here:

— Updated design and icon
— New button on the lower panel; lists can be sorted by Date Added, Reminder Date, and color
— The lower panel can now be swiped through
— Completely new timer system
— Completely new timer system for postponing reminders
— You can now make several timers such as «Morning,» Evening,» and «Midday»
— New timers: Beginning/middle/end of week, month, year
— 13 new reminder melodies
— The number on the icon can now be not just tasks for today or all tasks, but also only skipped tasks
— The birthday badge has been moved to the lower panel for quick access
— Now tapping the button for a task for today causes tasks from all lists to be displayed
— Birthday reminders have been fixed
— Birthdays can now be edited
— Completely new section: «Contribute to the Project»
— When you are adding a task and get a call the task is no longer deleted
— The «Enter» button now works correctly if you place the cursor anywhere in the task
— New instructional video
— The app has been optimized and bugs have been fixed

Stick with us. There are lots of cool things coming :)

Sorry the update took so long to be released. There were reasons, but the most important thing is that our long-awaited (I hope) update is now here:

— Updated the notification logic
— New feature: adding pictures to the task
— New feature: adding last screenshot to the task
— Tabs have become more informative
— Added a quick control functionality with on-screen reminders PUSH-notification
— Timers' and reminders' design has been updated
— Random sound notification
— Improved repeated reminders

— Fixed counter of missed reminders
— Fixed a bug related to the localization of applications
— Fixed bug with display of the bottom in the list of tasks
— Fixed a bug with the timer displayed when you long tap

Stick with us. There are lots of cool things coming :)

Sorry the update took so long to be released. There were reasons, but the most important thing is that our long-awaited (I hope) update is now here:

— Updated the notification logic
— New feature: adding pictures to the task
— New feature: adding last screenshot to the task
— Tabs have become more informative
— Added a quick control functionality with on-screen reminders PUSH-notification
— Timers' and reminders' design has been updated
— Random sound notification
— Improved repeated reminders

— Fixed counter of missed reminders
— Fixed a bug related to the localization of applications
— Fixed bug with display of the bottom in the list of tasks
— Fixed a bug with the timer displayed when you long tap

Stick with us. There are lots of cool things coming :)
Bug fix: Fixed the inability to add reminders with custom sorting
Bug fix: Fixed the inability to add reminders with custom sorting

Decreased the area of the task
From the locked screen, you can now postpone the task again
Other edits
Bugs fix

When the task is highlighted in red, it is automatically transferred to the top of the list
Moved selection of lists down the screen

Added new ringtones for reminders
Now you can put a separate melody, for tasks highlighted in red (important)
Reduced the size of the migration timers
Now you can quickly add a link from the browser directly to the ListBox

Added automatic synchronization with iOS family reminders
If you enable the function, each time you open the ListBox, new tasks from Reminders will automatically fall into your first list (with a time of reminder and even a priority)

Added support for Siri, available only to subscribers.

Commands:
"Remind me in application ListBox after 3 hours, call Mama"
"Remind me in application ListBox Buy Bread application"

Sorting tasks! I know you've waited a long time. So far, only two options - by the time of the reminder, and by the date of addition of the task

Added a new item in the add-on above the keyboard - now you can quickly add a number from the phone book that would not forget to call (long tap on the number - to activate)

A new cool application icon (if you do not like it for some reason, you can change it to the old one in the settings)

By popular demand, the application can now be purchased once and for all (the purchase is in the same place where the subscription in the settings is to help the project)

The gradients on the buttons are removed, now the colors are solid (I like it that way)

in 2.2:

Sorting tasks! I know you've waited a long time. So far, only two options - by the time of the reminder, and by the date of addition of the task

Added a new item in the add-on above the keyboard - now you can quickly add a number from the phone book that would not forget to call (long tap on the number - to activate)

A new cool application icon (if you do not like it for some reason, you can change it to the old one in the settings)

By popular demand, the application can now be purchased once and for all (the purchase is in the same place where the subscription in the settings is to help the project)

The gradients on the buttons are removed, now the colors are solid (I like it that way)

Absolutely new native design!

Section Birthdays
Search by task
Custom toolbar (in settings)
A new way to add a task
A few new sounds
Endless reminders (option in settings - Settings for additional reminders)
The ability to make timers 3 in a row
You can select a list by clicking on the name of the list from the top, or by clicking on the tabla again
And many other things that I do not even remember
Many bugs have been fixed, and most likely new ones have been added


In this release I did not do everything I wanted, but decided to release the update as soon as possible, then finish it.

Thank you for staying with ListBox <3
